apps.appName: QuizIct: Quiz of General Knowledge 2021- Free game
apps.appShortDescription: Play Quiz game to enhance your General knowledge also test your General knowledge.
apps.appLongDescription:
Unlike many others General knowledge quiz games, QuizIct gives you unlimited time to answer each question, 
you can play with your family üë®‚Äçüë®‚Äçüëß and friends üë¨, but try not to Google so much ü§óüòáü§ó. 
The quiz contains only general knowledge "fact" type of questions, no trivia questions from 
popular culture. Thus, this game will present a true test of your level of education! 
General knowledge quiz will test your general knowledge to the fullest that you have. 
The perfect quiz game to know the world with thousends of questions. 
Have fun to testing your expertise with this general knowledge quiz!
